description.value:
With but a mere word from your deity, you exploit a foe's fear to see their inner being brought low. You chastise the spirit of a foe within 30 feet that has the frightened condition. The target must attempt a @Check[will|against:class-spell] saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes @Damage[2[persistent,spirit]] damage. The first time the creature fails their flat check to recover from this, the persistent spirit damage doubles.

Failure The target takes @Damage[4[persistent,spirit]] damage. The first time the creature fails their flat check to recover from this, the persistent spirit damage doubles.

Critical Failure The target takes @Damage[6[persistent,spirit]] damage. The first time the creature fails their flat check to recover from this, the persistent spirit damage doubles.
